orderNumber.description: A user-defined order number used to identify an order.

orderDate.description: The date the order was placed. E.g. 2015-06-29T08:46:27.0000000

billTo.description: The recipients billing address. Use the [Address](https://www.shipstation.com/docs/api/models/address) model.

shipTo.description: The recipient's shipping address. Use the [Address](https://www.shipstation.com/docs/api/models/address) model.

customerUsername.description: The customer's username. Note: This property needs to be defined in order to generate a customer profile

items.description: An array of item objects. Use an array of [OrderItem](https://www.shipstation.com/docs/api/models/order-item) models.

gift.description: Specifies whether or not this Order is a gift
